projects.title: E-commerce Website Development
projects.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce website using React.js for the frontend and Node.js with Express.js for the backend. Integrated payment gateway and implemented user authentication.

projects.title: Mobile App Development
projects.description: Designed and developed a cross-platform mobile application using Flutter framework. Implemented features such as user authentication, push notifications, and real-time chat functionality.

projects.title: Data Analysis Project
projects.description: Conducted data analysis on a large dataset using Python and Pandas library. Applied various statistical techniques and visualized the results using Matplotlib and Seaborn.

education.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
education.description: Studied Computer Science at National University. Courses included algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and web development.

certificates.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
certificates.description: Earned AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate certification after completing a comprehensive training program and passing the certification exam.

certificates.title: Google IT Support Professional Certificate
certificates.description: Completed the Google IT Support Professional Certificate program offered by Coursera. Learned foundational IT skills including troubleshooting, customer service, networking, and system administration.

work_experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
work_experience.description: Interned as a Software Engineer at Company ABC. Developed and maintained web applications, participated in code reviews, and contributed to software design discussions.

work_experience.title: Software Engineer
